name: Aciron Consulting, Inc.
description:
Aciron Consulting, Inc. is a business management and technology consulting firm based in Cambridge, Massachusetts. Combining in-depth technical and industry experience with a commitment to building collaborative relationships with clients, Aciron delivers innovative services and solutions that meet clients' most complex business and technical needs.
A few of the services Aciron provides include:
• Custom software development
• Custom database development

• Microsoft SharePoint consulting
• IT strategy
• Gathering and documentation of business requirements
• Project management
• Website design and development
We believe technology offers substantial opportunities to leverage resources and sustain growth- especially in today’s business landscape. This is why we work with an international network of state-of-the-art technology professionals that produce only the highest of quality results all while keeping cost and time in mind.
We work closely with each client to develop practical, yet innovative recommendations through definition, development, implementation, and beyond. Aciron consultants take a client-centered approach to creating solutions by actively engaging clients in defining requirements and illustrating process understanding, while frequently providing project status updates.
